item.title: 1337UP 2024 - Full Writeup
item.author: theSaucese
item.description:
Intro

Amazing CTF, beginner friendly and is barely guessy, I wish I had more time to solve more challenges, it was super fun. This writeup contains all the challenges that I solved, Crypto, Misc, Osint, Rev and Web.

item.title: SpookyCTF 2024 - Full Writeup
item.author: theSaucese
item.description:
Intro

This CTF was fun and I would recommend it for beginners ! On par with DeadFace.

This writeup contains all the challanges that I have solved (14 challenges).

The categories were : Forensics, Osint, Steganography, Misc and Web (Well, technically it’s Reverse).

item.title: Cyber Odyssey 2024 - pyJail
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: Description : here you go, some free points.

item.title: DEADFACE 2024 - Winning Factors
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: Description : As another test of your programming prowess, Turbo Tactical wants to see if you can write a script to solve mathematic equations being served by a remote server within 3 seconds.

item.title: HTB Cyber-Apocalypse 2024 - Colored Squares
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: In the heart of an ancient forest stands a coloured towering tree, its branches adorned with countless doors. Each door, when opened, reveals a labyrinth of branching paths, leading to more doors beyond. As you venture deeper into the maze, the forest seems to come alive with whispered secrets and shifting shadows. With each door opened, the maze expands, presenting new choices and challenges at every turn. Can you understand what’s going on and get out of this maze?

item.title: HTB Cyber-Apocalypse 2024 - QuickScan
item.author: theSaucese
item.description: QuickScan is a Medium reversing challenge. Players will be sent a series of small, randomly generated ELF files and must rapidly and automatically anlalyse them in order to extract required data.
